Body:
t = Template(
    """

        <%def name="bar()">
            this is bar
        </%def>

        <%def name="comp1()">
            this comp1 should not be called
        </%def>

        <%def name="foo()">
            foo calling comp1: ${caller.comp1(x=5)}
            foo calling body: ${caller.body()}
        </%def>

        <%call expr="foo()">
            <%def name="comp1(x)">
                this is comp1, ${x}
            </%def>
            this is the body, ${comp1(6)}
        </%call>
        ${bar()}

"""
    )
assert result_lines(t.render()) == ['foo calling comp1:',
    'this is comp1, 5', 'foo calling body:', 'this is the body,',
    'this is comp1, 6', 'this is bar']
